text: Nimurangiza imigenzo y’umutambagiro mutagatifu wa Hija, musingize Allah nk’uko muvuga ibigwi by’abakurambere mujye musingiza banyu, (Allah) ahubwo cyane kurushaho. No mu bantu hari (abantu b’abangikanyamana) bavuga bati "Nyagasani wacu! Duhe (ibyiza) hano ku isi". Kandi abo nta mugabane (w’ibihembo) bazagira ku munsi w’imperuka
